mapper.select: select c.cosnum, c.lv, l.locnum, m.locname, m.locationx, m.locationy, m.loctype from COURSE c, COSLOC l, MAP m where l.locnum=m.locnum and c.cosnum=l.cosnum and c.cosnum=#{cosnum}
select count(*) from COSLOC where cosnum=#{cosnum}

select c.play, c.lv, c.cosnum, c.cosname, l.locnum, m.locname, m.locationx, m.locationy, m.loctype from COURSE c, COSLOC l, MAP m where l.locnum=m.locnum and c.cosnum=l.cosnum and c.play=#{play} and lv=#{lv}
